original_title: 娘のお友達と子供を作るので私、母親辞めます。 AIKA
overview: I tried to be ideal mother. But it was impossible. Because I was in heat with my daughter's classmate "Atsushi-kun" ... Adolescent boy who just woke up to sex. By the time he was invited to his house, seduced and brushed down, he was completely unreasonable. I noticed that it was a metamorphosis that I wanted to be seeded by being violently violated by this sexually active boy, and the feeling that was too distorted abandoned my position "mother" ... I was absorbed in making a child that was too abnormal.
title: I'm Making Babies With My Daughters Friend, so I'll Stop Being a Mom. AIKA.
